name: Sola Flower Collection- Natural Wedding Bouquet, Ivory Blush Bridal Bridesmaid Bouquet
description:
This is a listing for a custom made to order sola flower bridal or bridesmaid bouquet. The pictures show the bouquet in a large (27"), the perfect sized bridal bouquet. Smaller sizes are also available when purchasing. 

The sample bouquet is shown in ivory and blush and features shell, ivory mum, rose, gardenia, and carnation sola flowers and is embellished with pearls and natural babies breath. The stem is finished with twine, a lace collar, and pearls. This exact bouquet is not for sale, but I can create a similar bouquet for your big day.

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS please contact me for a shipping rate quote prior to ordering.

~Sola flowers are handmade from balsa wood. They are naturally cream/ivory in color. While they are made from wood they are quite soft, and natural looking. Since each flower is handmade no two flowers are exactly the same and natural variation will occur. That variation is what makes each item so unique and beautiful.~

I can also make coordinating centerpieces, boutonnieres, corsages, hair flowers, and flower girl items.

Please see my shop policies for more information on shipping and handling details and custom orders. 

Accessories by BelleAmourDesigns (not included in purchase) https://www.etsy.com/shop/BelleAmourDesigns

Distressed mason jars by BeachBlues www.BeachBluesHomeDecor.com

Designs, images, and text/descriptions are the property of and copyrighted © by Curious Floral, LLC, all rights are reserved.

name: Sola Flower Collection- Ivory Corsage, Mother of the Bride, Wedding Party, Grandmother, Flower girl
description:
This is a listing for one (1) custom (made to order) sola flower corsage. Sample features an ivory gardenia sola flower with pearl embellishment, natural babies breath, and ivory grosgrain ribbon.

Please contact me and we can customize your flowers for your perfect day.

This item is made to order at the time of purchase

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS please contact me for a S&H quote.

~Sola flowers are handmade from balsa wood. They are naturally cream/ivory in color. While they are made from wood they are quite soft, and natural looking. Since each flower is handmade no two flowers are exactly the same and natural variation will occur. That variation is what makes each item so unique and beautiful. These flowers will last a lifetime with the right care. Please keep away from open flame, do not allow prolonged contact with liquids, and keep these delicate items looking beautiful with careful handling. If traveling with your flowers please place back into the same packaging that they were shipped in to prevent crushing and damage.~

I also make coordinating bouquets, boutonnieres, centerpieces, hair flowers, and flower girl items. 

Beautifully distressed and perfectly shabby chic mason jars by Beach Blues www.BeachBluesHomeDecor.com (jars are not included with the purchase of this listing)

Designs, images, and text/descriptions are the property of and copyrighted © 2011-2014 by Curious Floral, LLC, all rights are reserved.

description:
This is a listing for a custom made to order sola flower bouquet, part of my Sola Flower Collection. The bouquet pictured is a junior size (20") and makes a perfect bridesmaid bouquet. Other sizes are available when purchasing. 

The sample bouquet is shown with ivory and navy sola flowers and is embellished with faux gold pearls, natural babies breath, twine stem finish with faux gold pearl finish. 

This exact bouquet is not for sale, but I can create a similar bouquet for your big day. If you'd like to change flower styles, stem wrapping, or flower colors, contact me for a custom order specialized just for you.

name: Sola Flower Collection- Ivory Teal Orange Pink Bridal or Bridesmaid Bouquet
description:
This is a listing for a custom sola flower bouquet and is made to order. Pictures feature a large bouquet (27"), smaller sizes are also available when purchasing. 

The sample bouquet is shown in ivory, teal, orange, and pink and features shell, mum, rose, carnation, and gardenia sola flowers, pearl accents, green caspia and natural babies breath, with rustic twine and pearl/lace collar stem finish. This exact bouquet is not for sale, but I can create a similar bouquet for your big day.

Looking for a different colors? This bouquet is custom and made to order and can be made to match your wedding colors. Please contact me to discuss your custom colors and custom wedding flowers.

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS please contact me for a shipping quote prior to purchasing!

I can also make coordinating centerpieces, boutonnieres,corsages, hair flowers, and flower girl items.

These "alternative" flowers are funky, eclectic, whimsical, and will be the talk of your big day (I know mine were). Better yet, they will last forever and are a fraction of the cost of real flowers. Make your special day that much easier by taking care of your bouquets before the wedding.

Please see my shop policies for more information on shipping and handling details and custom orders

Painted mason jars by our friends at www.BeachBluesHomeDecor.com

name: Wedding Hair Accessory- Bridal Bridesmaid Hair Comb
description:
One (1) made to order beautiful handmade wedding hair accessory. This beautiful piece features three mini sola roses in ivory, nude, and blush, and three mini sola mums in tan, ivory, and champagne, with a touch of natural preserved babies breath. The piece is secured to a plastic hair comb and is approximately 3" x 4"

Accent your rustic, shabby chic, vintage, outdoor, or beach wedding with this accessory. 

Custom coordinating wedding pieces are available, including: bouquets, centerpieces, flower balls, vases, boutonnieres, corsages, garland, and more.

Handmade rustic wood pieces made by our lovely friend Nicole of PNZ Designs www.pnzdesigns.com (not included with the purchase of this listing)

name: Wild Flower Collection- Natural Wedding Bouquet Keepsake Alternative Bouquet
description:
This is a listing for one (1) beautiful custom handmade wedding bouquet, part of my Wildflower Collection. 

This one of a kind piece features sola flowers in ivory, yellow, champagne, burnt orange, blue/gray. Flower styles include shell, rose, mum, gardenia, and carnation. The bouquet is accented with natural tan babies breath and soft green caspia with ivory tips. The stem is wrapped with rustic twine and finished with a dainty lace wrap accent, and ivory pearls. This bouquet will make a beautiful statement on your big day.

The bouquet is shown in a large (approximately 27" around) final dimensions may vary slightly because each piece is unique and handmade.

This bouquet can also be made in smaller sizes so you can deck out your entire bridal party. Please select your bouquet size when purchasing. This bouquet will make a wonderful keepsake or heirloom piece.

Coordinating corsages and boutonnieres are also available.

Flowers are hand dyed and can be changed to any color, please message me if you'd like to customize this piece. The stem wrap can also be changed to ribbon at no cost.

This bouquet is made to order at the time of purchase.

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS- Please contact me for a S&H quote

Accent your rustic, vintage, romantic, woodland, shabby chic, destination, garden, beach, or vineyard wedding.

Please see my shop policies for more information on shipping and handling details and custom orders.

name: Small Wedding Centerpiece Flowers, Wedding Reception, Wedding Decor, Rustic Wedding
description:
This listing is for ONE (1) small flower arrangement. My small arrangement has 8 stemmed sola flowers with tan gypsophila and soft green caspia. Flowers are attached to a flexible green cloth covered wire stem and are approximately 10" tall. This listing features shell, mum, and carnation flowers in cream, ivory, and aqua. Flowers and filler are loosely grouped together with twine for shipping, but they can be arranged or used loosely in a vase by you.

Flowers are hand dyed so any color combination is possible. Flowers are naturally a soft white/ivory color.

Larger and smaller arrangements are also available during checkout. 

These cute flowers are the perfect accent to your rustic, shabby chic, vintage, outdoor, or beach wedding. Use them as centerpieces, place them in mason jars along your ceremony aisle, or use them to decorate your home. Since these flowers are made from balsa wood, they'll never wilt!

***Beautifully distressed and perfectly shabby chic mason jar in copper by Beach Blues www.BeachBluesHomeDecor.com (jars are not included with the purchase of this listing)***

Custom coordinating wedding pieces are available, including: bouquets, flower balls, boutonnieres, corsages, garland, and more.

name: Flower Girl Wand Pink & Mint Romantic Collection- Mini Bouquet, Toss Bouquet, Junior Bridesmaid
description:
This is a listing for one (1) flower wand. This piece will make the perfect accessory for your flower girl or junior bridesmaid to carry down the aisle. It also makes a great budget friendly toss bouquet or bridesmaid "bouquet". The flower wand features 3 flowers. Part of my Pink & Mint Romantic Collection.

This "bouquet" is made out of sola flowers. The sample features an ivory gardenia, blush rose, and mint shell flower with natural tan babies breath and green caspia. The stem is wrapped in rustic twine with a dainty lace collar. 

This piece will be custom made to match your wedding.

This bouquet is made to order at the time of purchase.

name: Sola Flower Collection Bridal Bouquet- Ivory & Blush Bridemaid Bouquet, Alternative Bouquet
description:
This is a listing for a custom sola flower bridal or bridesmaid bouquet and is made to order, part of my Sola Flower Collection

Bouquets are made out of sola flowers. Various styles are available and flowers range from 1.5-2.5 inches. The bouquet as shown is a large and approximately 27" around (final dimensions vary due to the handmade nature of each flower). The large bouquet is the perfect size for a bridal bouquet, smaller sizes are available to use for your bridesmaids, junior bridesmaids, flower girl, or toss bouquet. 

The sample bouquet is shown in ivory and peach-blush features shell, ivory mum, rose, gardenia, and carnation sola flowers and is embellished with pearls and natural babies breath. The stem is wrapped with ivory tulle with an ivory lace collar and pearls. This exact bouquet is not for sale, but I can create a similar bouquet for your big day. Looking for a different color or finish? I hand dye my flowers so I can create flowers perfect for your wedding, contact me about a custom order!

This item is made to order at the time of purchase. 

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS please contact me for a shipping rate quote prior to ordering.

I can also make coordinating centerpieces, boutonnieres, corsages, hair flowers, and flower girl items.

After the wedding, use these in your favorite vase around your house.

The bouquet sample bouquet is shown in a large size and is 27" around (final sizes vary due to the unique handmade nature of each item). Additional sizes are available at check out. Various styles are available and flowers range from 1.5-2.5 inches.

The sample bouquet is shown in ivory and natural burlap and features shell, mum, carnation, rose, and gardenia sola flowers and natural burlap rosettes and is accented with pearls, natural babies breath, a burlap stem wrap with lace collar. This exact bouquet is not for sale, but I can create a similar bouquet for your big day.

name: Romantic Wedding Bouquet -Natural Bridal Keepsake Alternative Bouquet, Shabby Chic Rustic Wedding
description:
This is a listing for one (1) beautiful custom handmade bouquet, part of my Romantic Collection.

The sample bouquet is shown in a medium (25" circ), perfect to use as a subtle bridal bouquet or larger bridesmaid bouquet. This bouquet is available in other sizes. 

This one of a kind piece features sola flowers in ivory, cream, blush, nude, and champagne/tan. Flower styles include shell, rose, mum, gardenia, and carnation. Also included are delicate parchment ivory hydrangeas with soft green or cream accents. The bouquet is accented with natural babies breath, soft green caspia with ivory tips, and hand-wired soft velvet leaves. The stem is wrapped with rustic twine and finished with an antique ivory lace collar, and ivory pearls. This bouquet will make a beautiful statement on your big day.

This bouquet can also be made in smaller sizes so you can deck out your entire bridal party. This bouquet will make a wonderful keepsake or heirloom piece.

See the entire Romantic Collection here: http://www.curiousfloral.bigcartel.com/romantic-collections

This bouquet is made to order at the time of purchase.

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS- Please contact me for a rate quote to your country if it's not listed below.

name: Vintage Collection- Large Wedding Bouquet, Ivory Lace Black Keepsake Alternative Bouquet
description:
This is a listing for one (1) beautiful custom handmade bouquet, part of my Vintage Collection. The sample bouquet shown is a large (27"), other sizes are available*. 

This one of a kind piece features ivory sola flowers and parchment hydrangeas. Flower styles include shell, rose, mum, petunia, and carnation. The bouquet is accented with natural tan babies breath, soft green caspia with ivory tips, gold pearl pins, and black crystals. The stem is wrapped with black satin and finished with an ivory lace wrap, and faux gold pearl pins. This bouquet will make a beautiful statement on your big day.

This piece is CUSTOM MADE TO ORDER, product time for single pieces is typically 12-16 weeks. 

Sizes are approximate, final dimensions may vary slightly because each piece is unique and handmade.

This bouquet can also be made in smaller sizes so you can deck out your entire bridal party. This bouquet will make a wonderful keepsake or heirloom piece.

Coordinating corsages and boutonnieres are also available.

Flowers are hand dyed and can be changed to any color, please message me if you'd like to customize this piece.

This bouquet is made to order at the time of purchase.
